thread.title: Customer-Nancy B Macklin
thread.title_full: Vital Choice reviewed by Customer-Nancy B Macklin

author: Customer-Nancy B Macklin
title: Customer-Nancy B Macklin
text: There have been issues over the years but such as fish arriving spoiled but Vital Choice has always quickly replaced order and learned from experiences. Changes were made such as with packaging materials and dry ice contents and those issues have ceased to exit. Their wild fish and other products are absolutely the best! I just wish the standard delivery for non-perishables items could be quicker. I would (and do) recommend Vital Choice to others since I have used other fish companies and know that Vital Choice is the best for quality and great tasting wild and organic products, delivery and customer service. I order wild and fresh Copper River Salmons from another company during the summer and they are superb, but I wish Vital Choice carried "Fresh and Wild" during spring/summer because I think they would be even better! The frozen Copper Rivers do not capture the glorious taste of the real wild deals. Thanks for your service.
